title: AI-Powered Content Generator
tagline: Generate high-quality content using GPT-4 in seconds

children.text: A comprehensive SaaS platform that leverages OpenAI's GPT-4 to generate various types of content including blog posts, social media captions, product descriptions, and more. Features include template library, tone customization, and multi-language support.

achievements: Featured on Product Hunt - #3 Product of the Day
challenges: Implementing rate limiting and cost optimization for API usage while maintaining quality. Solved by implementing intelligent caching and request batching.

title: DevCollab - Developer Collaboration Platform
tagline: Real-time collaborative coding for distributed teams

children.text: A real-time collaboration platform for developers featuring live code editing, video chat, screen sharing, and integrated project management. Built to support remote development teams working across different time zones.

achievements: Integrated with GitHub, GitLab, and Bitbucket
challenges: Ensuring smooth real-time collaboration with minimal latency across global users. Implemented WebRTC with fallback mechanisms and regional server deployment.

title: EcoTrack - Carbon Footprint Tracker
tagline: Track and reduce your environmental impact

children.text: Mobile and web application that helps individuals track their carbon footprint through daily activities. Provides personalized recommendations for reducing environmental impact and connects users with eco-friendly alternatives.

achievements: 50,000+ downloads on App Store and Play Store
Users collectively saved 500 tons of CO2
challenges: Building accurate ML models to estimate carbon footprint from various activities. Collaborated with environmental scientists and used extensive datasets for training.

title: SmartInvoice - Automated Invoicing System
tagline: Streamline invoicing and payment tracking for freelancers

children.text: An intelligent invoicing system designed for freelancers and small businesses. Features automatic invoice generation, payment reminders, expense tracking, and financial reporting with beautiful, customizable templates.

title: CodeReview AI - Automated Code Review Tool
tagline: AI-powered code reviews for better code quality

children.text: An AI-powered tool that automatically reviews pull requests, identifies bugs, suggests improvements, and ensures code quality standards. Integrates seamlessly with GitHub and GitLab.

title: FitnessPro - Workout & Nutrition Tracker
tagline: Your personal fitness companion powered by AI

children.text: Comprehensive fitness application with AI-powered workout recommendations, meal planning, progress tracking, and social features. Helps users achieve their fitness goals with personalized guidance.
